DataElement.preferredName: Prior Therapy Total Chemotherapy Treatment Regimen Administered Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The total number of prior chemotherapy regimens received.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Procedure Domain Prior Therapy Total Chemotherapy Treatment Regimen Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure._An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases._A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Property.preferredName: Prior Therapy Total Chemotherapy Treatment Regimen Administered
Property.preferredDefinition: An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy.:Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.:A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.
A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
